productname: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications
meta: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP3

abstract.para: This guide provides detailed information about how to install and customize SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications to monitor hardware related metrics to provide insights that can help increase uptime of critical SAP applications. It is based on SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP3. The concept however can also be used starting with SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP1.
